name: Banjo-Tooie: Rejiggied
description:
Early prototype of Banjo-Tooie: Rejiggied.
Game will only consist of the Mayahem Temple Level.
A controller is required for playing.

Discord Link: https://discord.gg/5c7frCjvHd

Controls:

B interact / roll / Flying - Beak Bomb

A jump / Flying - Flap

L Trigger - Aim

L Trigger + R Trigger - Shoot

L Shoulder + Left Directional - Talon Trot
